intro: This level combines all Python basics into small real-world style problems.
points: Combine loops, conditions, and functions in a single program.
Use lists, dictionaries, and strings together to solve problems.
Implement small console-based apps like calculators or text analyzers.
Focus on writing clean, readable, and commented code.
Practice debugging and improving your own solutions.
